questions.text: What did Charlie Brown's father do for a living?
On the Halloween special, what did everyone give to Charlie Brown when he went trick or treating?
What is the comic strip's name that features Charlie Brown?
What is Charlie Brown's sister's name?
Who did Charlie Brown have a crush on?
Who played shortstop on Charlie Brown's baseball team?
Who was always pulling out the football before Charlie Brown was able to kick it?
What is Charlie Brown always getting caught in a tree?
Which of Charlie Brown's friend carries a security blanket?
Who had a Top 40 hit with the song 'Charlie Brown'?
questions.explanation:
The Coasters.

	Why is everybody always picking on me.
